abstract: Britain reopens its embassy in Tehran, Iran, closed since November 2011, in sign of easing tensions between the two countries as result of landmark nuclear deal.
lead_paragraph: The British foreign secretary witnessed the raising of the Union flag over the compound, in a sign of newly thawed relations in the wake of a landmark nuclear deal.

headline.main: British Embassy Reopens in Iran’s Capital
headline.print_headline: British Embassy Reopens in Iran’s Capital

snippet: The British foreign secretary witnessed the raising of the Union flag over the compound, in a sign of newly thawed relations in the wake of a landmark nuclear deal.
